description: From translingual Tilapia, from Tswana tlhapi (“fish”).

entries.meaning: Any of various edible fish, formerly species of the genus Tilapia, but now placed in other cichlid genera (such as Oreochromis), native to Africa and the Middle East but cultivated worldwide.
examples: Well I dined last night with Scarface Ron
On tilapia fishcakes and fried black swan.
